summary: Completed all 6 phases: archived broken single-history construction, added DecidableEq for MCSTrackedHistory, implemented tracked saturation step with proofs, proved tracked_fixed_point_is_saturated, built fdsm_from_tracked_saturation, added closure membership infrastructure. Key theorems proven: tracked_fixed_point_is_saturated, closure_mcs_modus_ponens.

artifacts.summary: Archived single-history FDSM construction with documentation explaining modal trivialization
MCS-tracked saturation infrastructure with fdsm_from_tracked_saturation construction
Updated with fdsm_from_full_mcs wrapper and documentation
Added closure membership helper lemmas including closure_mcs_modus_ponens
Complete implementation summary with all phases, theorems proven, and remaining sorries

completion_data.completion_summary: Implemented multi-history modal saturation for FDSM completeness. Archived broken single-history construction to Boneyard, added MCSTrackedHistory with type class instances, implemented tracked_saturation_step with proofs, proved tracked_fixed_point_is_saturated (core correctness theorem), built fdsm_from_tracked_saturation construction, and added closure_mcs_modus_ponens lemma for TruthLemma support.
